song.englishname: I Know That the Lord Is Great

english.segment1: CHORUS. I know that the Lord is great, I know that the Lord is great, I know that the Lord is great. Our Lord is greater than all gods.
english.segment2: VERSE. The Lord does whatever pleases him in the heavens and on the earth, on the earth and in the seas and all their depths, oh. I know .. (CHORUS)
english.segment3: VERSE. The Lord, he makes the clouds to rise from the ends of the earth. He sends lightning with the rain, and brings the wind, oh. I know that the Lord is great, I know that the Lord is great, I know that the Lord is great. Our Lord is greater than all gods, our Lord is greater than all gods, our Lord is greater than all gods.
